Uses of Interface
entities.orders.Orders

Packages that use Orders
Package Description
entities
Contains basic entities used in the game like countries, continents, map and player.
entities.orders
Contains all the orders which the user provides during game phase.
strategy  

  • Uses of Orders in entities

    Fields in entities with type parameters of type Orders
    Modifier and Type Field Description
    java.util.Queue<Orders> Player.d_orders
    This Queue stores the object of type Orders for each Player to be executed in FIFO pattern later.
    Methods in entities that return Orders
    Modifier and Type Method Description
    Orders Player.nextOrder()
    method to get next order from the orders queue

  • Uses of Orders in entities.orders

    Classes in entities.orders that implement Orders
    Modifier and Type Class Description
    class  Advance
    This class represents the advance command.
    class  Airlift
    This class represents the airlift card.
    class  Blockade
    Whenever blockade card is used, the player can triple the armies present in one of the country they control and in return looses control over that country, neutral player gets the control of the country.
    class  Bomb
    This class represents the bomb card.
    class  Deploy
    Players can place reinforcements to the countries they control.
    class  Diplomacy
    This class represents the diplomacy card.
    class  Dummy
    This class is dummy order class, in order to return something of Order type in command which does all the processing itself and not done by Orders object, then this class is used.
    class  Exit
    This is the exit class order, while in IssueOrder phase, if the player types exit() to commit its command then, this class is used.

  • Uses of Orders in strategy

    Methods in strategy that return Orders
    Modifier and Type Method Description
    Orders Aggresive.createOrder()
    this function creates orders keeping in mind how the aggressive player plays.
    Orders Benevolent.createOrder()
    this function creates orders keeping in mind how the aggressive player plays.
    Orders Cheater.createOrder()
    Logic for the Cheater Player, acquiring all the neighbor countries and doubling the armies.
    Orders HumanPlayer.createOrder()
    this function creates orders keeping in mind how the human player plays.
    abstract Orders PlayerStrategy.createOrder()
    method that is implemented by concrete strategy classes
    Orders RandomPlayer.createOrder()
    this function creates orders keeping in mind how the aggressive player plays.
